@TheAndrewWyatt @auchenberg @TheLarkInn @bitandbang It's a new label for mostly old technology. But the tooling and the mindset is different. With automation and careful thought "static" can do so much that we currently over engineer fragile, complex things to do. + Security, scale & perf are by default not hard fought to get
